thread.section_title: Pond5 Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pond5 | www.pond5.com | 3 of 185
thread.title: Darrel Betts

author: Darrel Betts
title: Darrel Betts
text: Pond5 is an amazing resource. I really love how the site is organized, with a solid search engine that saves me time when I need something fast. Audio tracks include the waveform, so I can see stings and tails if I need them. The audio library is huge, and there are some great pieces in there that have worked perfectly in my productions. The AE templates are a game changer when you're in a crunch. Well worth the money in time savings alone! Highly recommend.
